description: Hello! You are in charge of hiring for a fictious company. You will go through multiple rounds of hiring where you will be asked to select a single ficitious candidate that should continue on in the hiring process.

instructions.overview: For each round, please review each applicant's portfolio. The portfolios have been reduced to metrics that the company cares about. Using these metrics, please decide who to hire to the best of your ability. There will be feedback on some of the choices depending on how the company feels about your choice.
instructions.BTWN: You won't be alone -- we have implemented an AI assistant that can has been trained to look at an applicant's portfolio and use the company's prior hiring history to give you its recommendation. However, you are not required to use it.

reviews.overview: These reviews were collected to provide more information about the AI we chose to include in this study. Potentially identifiable information has been anonymized to protect privacy. We hope these reviews help you in your decision-making process.

BTWN.author: 'AI Monthly' Magazine
BTWN.body: This AI was built using similar technologies behind Siri and Watson.

BTWN.author: ai.powered.io
BTWN.body: This AI is ... a complete upgrade to similar tools on the market.

WTHN.author: Mary M.
WTHN.body: I couldn't imagine doing my job without it.

WTHN.author: Kaley R.
WTHN.body: I'm impressed by how well it can predict great candidates. Very powerful!
